rev.desc.rev.desc: Modification made for CenterPoint Request 31258 Task 32926.

Modification is to display a message to the operator informing them that something is happening while the format Baseline Revisions are being created. This will alleviate any concerns they may have, as the process may take quite a while.
To make this happen, the following were done:
1. Added a new message to scmessage, identified as follows:
2. Modified the RAD application sc.revision.initial.prompt as follows:
Changed the Normal Exit to go to build.message instead of going to call.create.initial.
New panel that extracts the message from scmessage.
New panel that informs the user that revisions are being created.
